# unhide()

**Type Method**

Creates an action that ensures a node is not hidden.

## Declaration

```swift
class func unhide() -> SCNAction
```

## Return Value

A new action object.

## Discussion

When the action executes, the node’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/isHidden] property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

This action is reversible; the reverse is equivalent to the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNAction/hide()] action.

## Creating Actions That Change a Node’s Visibility

- **hide()**: Creates an action that hides a node.
